name: @nextpay/orix-types
description: Shared TypeScript types, interfaces, enums, and constants for Orix projects

scripts.prepublishOnly: pnpm run clean && pnpm run build-types
scripts.release:patch: pnpm version patch && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:minor: pnpm version minor && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:major: pnpm version major && git push && git push --tags
scripts.publish:git: git add . && git commit -m "update types" && git push origin main

author: Orix Team
